column5: Completely updated and fully furnished duplex with upgrades including granite counters, bamboo and travertine flooring, new fixtures throughout and much more. The living room has the most comfortable down sectional sofa and is perfect for unwinding from your day while watching television. Two bedrooms have queen beds and the third bedroom has a day bed with a trundle and a large desk. Free wifi and cable. There's an over-sized covered deck in backyard with grill and patio furniture.
column8: Next to DFW airport and Grapevine
